g_odvw_1::clip_card_2::goals[0]: Show a location important to your character or question.
g_odvw_1::clip_card_1::goals[0]: Show your character doing something related to your question.
g_odvw_1::markdown_card_0::text: With your partner, choose one of the following questions you will each ask the other * What is your experience with mobile journalism? * How was your trip to the workshop? * What has been your favorite part of the workshop so far?
g_odvw_1::text_card_0::text: هر کدام با تلفن‌های خودتان، با همراه خود مصاحبه کنید.
g_odvw_1::text_card_7::text: نگران نباشید. همه کلیپ‌ها در گالری ذخیره شده‌اند.
g_odvw_1::text_card_8::text: When you finish uploading, return to class.
g_odvw_1::text_card_3::text: Be careful to provide proper headspace for your interview.
g_odvw_1::text_card_6::text: If you recorded multiple clips in a single card, delete all but your chosen 3 clips before you publish.
g_odvw_1::text_card_1::text: اطمینان یابید که به اندازه کافی به همراه خود نزدیک شده‌اید.
g_odvw_1::text_card_4::text: با لمس تصویر کلیپ، آنها را مرتب کنید.
g_odvw_1::text_card_2::text: اگر صداهای زمینه زیادی وجود ارد، یک جای دیگر پیدا کنید.
g_odvw_1::title: Interview your partner.
g_odvw_1::intro_card_0::headline: Interview your partner.
g_odvw_1::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Remember, ask your subject one question, you can shoot multiple times if needed.
